title: (Tues Full) Lunchbox's Spills The Tea About What Happened In Vegas + Bobby Saw A Request From A Listener And The Best Thing Happened + Is Wearing Clothes Once and Returning It Okay? (Tues Full) Lunchbox's Spills The Tea About What Happened In Vegas + Bobby Saw A Request From A Listener And The Best Thing Happened + Is Wearing Clothes Once and Returning It Okay?
itunes:title: (Tues Full) Lunchbox's Spills The Tea About What Happened In Vegas + Bobby Saw A Request From A Listener And The Best Thing Happened + Is Wearing Clothes Once and Returning It Okay? (Tues Full) Lunchbox's Spills The Tea About What Happened In Vegas + Bobby Saw A Request From A Listener And The Best Thing Happened + Is Wearing Clothes Once and Returning It Okay?
description:
Lunchbox spills the tea about Amy in Vegas this past weekend and makes her confess what happened. Plus, Bobby helps a listener who had the sweetest request for her son's wedding about getting a special guest to send a message, he finally was able to help her! Then we discuss how 50% of people say wearing clothes once and returning it is okay and whether we agree or not and if we have ever done that.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
